game.name: Just Another Boomer Shooter
game.shortDescription: Take the role of Tommy Gunn (no relation) as he's forced to pass a series of maniacally (and hastily) made "Levels" in order to get more views on Twitch for his new Pal/Drill Sergeant/Gamemaster Solid P. Chip.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take the role of Tommy Gunn (no relation) as he's forced to pass a series of maniacally (and hastily) made "Levels" in order to get more views on Twitch for his new Pal/Drill Sergeant/Gamemaster Solid P. Chip.
